intro: Lotononis dichotoma, commonly known as the dichotomous lotononis, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. Its flowers are small and yellow, arranged in a compact cluster, and it produces achene fruits that are dispersed by wind. Lotononis dichotoma is often found in grasslands and rocky areas, thriving in well-drained soils.
